column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Our server got our drink and appetizer order right away. We got the cheesy spinach bread appetizer which was absolutely delicious. It was a great way to start the meal. Our pizza didn't take too long after that
column2: and our server made sure our order was right before bringing it to use since we wanted half to be vegetarian. We got a small deep dish (9 inches) which was the perfect amount for 2 people
column3: especially considering we already had an appetizer.
